thread.title: John Gatfield

author: John Gatfield
title: John Gatfield
text:
Left with daughters car to get serviced and MOT tomorrow, noticed 3 of the tyres were on the limit ordered 4 on line with next day 2 hour time slot.
As soon as the payment went though, had a confirming phone call and time slot set.
Steve the fitter was there for me when I returned for the next day appointed time. Polite and efficient service with no problems. I would honestly recommend this service to anyone in a similar situation! all I have to do now is sort the air bag light and the brakes...hey it's what Dads are for - right?
